languages.text: "Еретики в открытую напали на корабль Вольного Торговца. Член вашей династии, Кунрад Войгтвир, оказался одним из них! И сам Футфол увязает в безумии все больше. В эти смутные дни я готова поверить в еретиков, в открытую вершащих свои темные ритуалы и без страха помечающих свои вертепы богомерзкими символами".

traits.locale_text: "Еретики в открытую напали на корабль Вольного Торговца. Член вашей династии, Кунрад Войгтвир, оказался одним из них! И сам Футфол увязает в безумии все больше. В эти смутные дни я готова поверить в еретиков, в открытую вершащих свои темные ритуалы и без страха помечающих свои вертепы богомерзкими символами".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."
languages.original_text: "Еретики в открытую напали на корабль Вольного Торговца. Член вашей династии, Кунрад Войгтвир, оказался одним из них! И сам Футфол увязает в безумии все больше. В эти смутные дни я готова поверить в еретиков, в открытую вершащих свои темные ритуалы и без страха помечающих свои вертепы богомерзкими символами".

In these times of trouble, I'm ready to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “异端分子公然袭击行商浪人的舰船，而你的王朝其中一名成员，昆拉德·维特威尔，也是他们之中的一员！不仅如此，就连落脚港本身也在疯狂之中越陷越深。在这个充满纷争的时代，我相信确实有厚颜无耻的异端分子公然举行邪恶仪式，用亵渎性的符号来标记他们的窝点。”
languages.original_text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

traits.locale_text: “异端分子公然袭击行商浪人的舰船，而你的王朝其中一名成员，昆拉德·维特威尔，也是他们之中的一员！不仅如此，就连落脚港本身也在疯狂之中越陷越深。在这个充满纷争的时代，我相信确实有厚颜无耻的异端分子公然举行邪恶仪式，用亵渎性的符号来标记他们的窝点。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los herejes han asaltado abiertamente la nave de una Comerciante Independiente. ¡Un miembro de tu dinastía, Kunrad Voigtvir, ha resultado ser uno de ellos! Paso se sume gradualmente en la locura. En momentos como este, no me resulta difícil creer que haya herejes que celebran abiertamente sus rituales siniestros y marcan sus guaridas con símbolos sacrílegos».
languages.original_text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes han asaltado abiertamente la nave de una Comerciante Independiente. ¡Un miembro de tu dinastía, Kunrad Voigtvir, ha resultado ser uno de ellos! Paso se sume gradualmente en la locura. En momentos como este, no me resulta difícil creer que haya herejes que celebran abiertamente sus rituales siniestros y marcan sus guaridas con símbolos sacrílegos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「異端者が自由開拓者の船に攻撃を仕掛けた。陛下の王朝の一員であるクンラッド・ボイトヴィルがその一人であることが判明したのです！そして、フットフォール自体も、ますます狂気に沈んでいる。このような争いの時代に、公然と暗黒の儀式を行い、堂々と彼らの巣穴に冒涜的なシンボルを記す異端者が存在することを、我は確信しています」
languages.original_text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者が自由開拓者の船に攻撃を仕掛けた。陛下の王朝の一員であるクンラッド・ボイトヴィルがその一人であることが判明したのです！そして、フットフォール自体も、ますます狂気に沈んでいる。このような争いの時代に、公然と暗黒の儀式を行い、堂々と彼らの巣穴に冒涜的なシンボルを記す異端者が存在することを、我は確信しています」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ketzer haben ein Freihändlerschiff offen angegriffen. Ein Mitglied Eurer Dynastie, Kunrad Voigtvir, gehört sogar zu ihnen! Und Footfall selbst versinkt immer tiefer im Wahnsinn. In derart unruhigen Zeiten glaube ich durchaus an Ketzer, die ihre dunklen Rituale offen durchführen und ihre Verstecke ungerührt mit gotteslästerlichen Symbolen markieren."
languages.original_text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

traits.locale_text: "Ketzer haben ein Freihändlerschiff offen angegriffen. Ein Mitglied Eurer Dynastie, Kunrad Voigtvir, gehört sogar zu ihnen! Und Footfall selbst versinkt immer tiefer im Wahnsinn. In derart unruhigen Zeiten glaube ich durchaus an Ketzer, die ihre dunklen Rituale offen durchführen und ihre Verstecke ungerührt mit gotteslästerlichen Symbolen markieren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Des hérétiques ont attaqué ouvertement le vaisseau d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, et il s'est avéré qu'un membre de votre propre dynastie, Kunrad Voigtvir, était l'un des leurs ! Sans parler de Castel qui sombre de plus en plus profondément dans la folie. En cette période de conflit, je suis prête à croire que les hérétiques se sont enhardis au point de réaliser leurs sombres rituels au grand jour et de marquer effrontément leurs repaires avec des symboles sacrilèges. »
languages.original_text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

traits.locale_text: « Des hérétiques ont attaqué ouvertement le vaisseau d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, et il s'est avéré qu'un membre de votre propre dynastie, Kunrad Voigtvir, était l'un des leurs ! Sans parler de Castel qui sombre de plus en plus profondément dans la folie. En cette période de conflit, je suis prête à croire que les hérétiques se sont enhardis au point de réaliser leurs sombres rituels au grand jour et de marquer effrontément leurs repaires avec des symboles sacrilèges. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kâfirler, Hür Tacir'in gemisine ayan beyan saldırdı. Hanedanlık mensuplarından Kunrad Voigtvir onlardan çıktı! Binliman ise günden güne deliliğe teslim oluyor. Kâfirler de pekâlâ ihtilaf dönemini fırsat bilip menfur ayinlerini ulu orta sergiliyor, inlerini kutsala hürmetsizlik eden sembollerle işaretliyor olabilirler. Kanaatim bu yönde."
languages.original_text: "Heretics have launched an open attack on a Rogue Trader's ship. A member of your dynasty, Kunrad Voigtvir, has turned out to be one of them! And Footfall itself is sinking deeper and deeper into madness. In these times of strife, I'm willing to believe in heretics who openly perform their dark rituals and brazenly mark their dens with sacrilegious symbols."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler, Hür Tacir'in gemisine saldırmaya cüret etti. Hanedanlığının mensuplarından Kunrad Voigtvir de kâfirlerden biri çıktı! Binliman ise günden güne deliliğe teslim oluyor. Kâfirler de pekâlâ ihtilaf dönemini fırsat bilip menfur ayinlerini ulu orta sergiliyor, inlerini günahkâr sembollerle işaretliyor olabilirler. Kanaatim bu yönde."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
